title: How tech’s biggest companies are offloading the risks of the AI boom
description: As demand for artificial intelligence surges, tech giants like Microsoft and Meta are using creative financing and short-term contracts to add computing power while shifting much of the long-term risk to smaller companies and their lenders.
content: They also signalled new ways the biggest companies in tech are manoeuvring to push some of the risk of the AI boom onto the shoulders of upstarts eager for a piece of the action. The moves let companies like Meta and Microsoft add computing power qui... [6863 chars]

title: US government launches campaign to hire engineers for AI, tech roles
description: The US government is launching a major recruitment drive to hire one thousand engineers. These professionals will work on critical government projects for two-year terms. The initiative specifically seeks individuals with artificial intelligence skills. The goal is to bring top talent to tackle complex national challenges. This program aims to fill positions by March thirty-first.
content:

title: OpenAI Deal To License Disney Characters Is Entirely In Stock
description: OpenAI is getting access to Disney’s kingdom without cutting a check. The artificial intelligence company’s recent deal to license iconic characters from Walt Disney Co. for its Sora video app is entirely in stock warrants rather than a cash licensing fee, according to people familiar with the matter. OpenAI will offer Disney the option to purchase shares in the high-flying startup beyond its previously announced $1 billion stake.
content:
OpenAI is getting access to Disney’s kingdom without cutting a check.

title: AI chatbots could help reduce mental health stigma
description: New Edith Cowan University (ECU) research suggests artificial intelligence chatbots like ChatGPT may help reduce mental health stigma, particularly for people hesitant to seek traditional face-to-face support.
content:

title: Lightspeed Venture Partners mops up more than $9 billion across six funds
description: According to the firm, the funds will be deployed across seed, early-stage, growth and later-stage investments globally, spanning sectors such as artificial intelligence, enterprise software, fintech, healthcare and consumer technology.

title: US suspends technology deal with Britain, FT reports
description: Dec 15 - The United States has suspended a technology deal it struck with Britain earlier this year, which ‍was ​intended to boost ties in ‍artificial intelligence, quantum computing and civil nuclear energy, the Financial ​Times ​reported on Monday. Read more at straitstimes.com.
